Name: Raise the Roof
Desc: A cool-flavored throat lozenge. Said to be the Flower-Feather Clan's secret weapon for soothing their throats and protecting their vocal cords â€” so go sing your heart out! Just make sure you don't go overboard, as too much sugar can leave your throat feeling hoarse.
Effect: A little surprise from the Flower-Feather Clan.
